Articles.Content:
Greetings, fellow Kosmonauts! Starting possibly this week, and most definitely by next week, I will begin a bold new idea for a let's play series.

My format will include a timeline of events, a list of special activities, and a narrated summary (myself doing the voiceover, of course), followed by the mission footage itself. I'll be recording just as I play it normally, and present it as true mission footage. Perhaps with some careful editing I can make some authentic-looking films!

I will be using ONLY TWO MODS for this series: Engineer to handle the calculations for Delta-V and the like, and Chatterer for immersion.

I hope to have a lot of fun, and hope you all support me!
